_header: Johan the Miller hath I-ground small small small
Note: Text preserved in early chronicles, such as Walsingham and Knighton, and followed in most later chronicles. Cf. 2957.
Subjects: abuses, of the age; Peasants’ Revolt (1381); historical poems
_description: Moralising verses by John Ball in a letter to the peasants of Essex, 1381 — eight lines
